name: polyethylene terephthalate, granulate, bottle grade, recycled to generic market for bottle grade PET granulate | polyethylene terephthalate, granulate, bottle grade | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/16749/documentation

This is a renaming activity linking recycled polyethylene terephthalate (PET), bottle grade, granulate to the generic market for bottle grade PET granulate.;The transport distances are taken for commodity class NTS 08 (Chemicals, chemical products, and man-made fibers; rubber and plastic products; nuclear fuel) ; from a model based on statistics on transport of goods in Switzerland (Valsasina, 2016, Default transport data per commodity group for Switzerland, ecoinvent, www.ecoinvent.org).
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2013:Manufacture of plastics and synthetic rubber in primary forms
